[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [VerticalFlyout](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.md) &gt; [isDragTowardWorkspace](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.isdragtowardworkspace_1_method.md)

## VerticalFlyout.isDragTowardWorkspace() method

Determine if a drag delta is toward the workspace, based on the position and orientation of the flyout. This is used in determineDragIntention\_ to determine if a new block should be created or if the flyout should scroll.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isDragTowardWorkspace(currentDragDeltaXY: Coordinate): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

currentDragDeltaXY


</td><td>

[Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md)


</td><td>

How far the pointer has moved from the position at mouse down, in pixel units.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

True if the drag is toward the workspace.
